languages.text: {n}Струя алкоголя бьет вас в нос, руки соскальзывают с парапета. При полном параде и всем своем вооружении вы с ужасающе громким плеском падаете в ароматный напиток.{/n}
{n}A stream of alcohol hits your nose. Your hands slip off the parapet. In full dress and along with all your weapons, you fall into the fragrant liquor, making a terribly loud splash.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Струя алкоголя бьет вас в нос, руки соскальзывают с парапета. При полном параде и всем своем вооружении вы с ужасающе громким плеском падаете в ароматный напиток.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A stream of alcohol hits your nose. Your hands slip off the parapet. In your full dress and with all your weapons, you fall into the fragrant liquor, making a terribly loud splash.{/n}
{n}A stream of alcohol hits your nose. Your hands slip off the parapet. In your full dress and with all your weapons, you fall into the fragrant liquor, making a terribly loud splash.{/n}
{n}A stream of alcohol hits your nose. Your hands slip off the parapet. In full dress and along with all your weapons, you fall into the fragrant liquor, making a terribly loud splash.{/n}

{n}A stream of alcohol hits your nose. Your hands slip off the parapet. In full dress and along with all your weapons, you fall into the fragrant liquor, making a terribly loud splash.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一股酒精呛进了你的鼻子里，你的手从护栏上滑了下来。你穿着一整套正装，带着所有的武器，摔进了芬芳的美酒里，发出了可怕的“哗啦”声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A stream of alcohol hits your nose. Your hands slip off the parapet. In full dress and along with all your weapons, you fall into the fragrant liquor, making a terribly loud splash.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一股酒精呛进了你的鼻子里，你的手从护栏上滑了下来。你穿着一整套正装，带着所有的武器，摔进了芬芳的美酒里，发出了可怕的“哗啦”声。{/n}

languages.text: {n}アルコールの香りが鼻をついた。手が手すり壁から滑り落ちた。正装し、すべての武器を身につけた状態で、派手な水しぶきと共に香り高い酒の中に落ちた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A stream of alcohol hits your nose. Your hands slip off the parapet. In full dress and along with all your weapons, you fall into the fragrant liquor, making a terribly loud splash.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アルコールの香りが鼻をついた。手が手すり壁から滑り落ちた。正装し、すべての武器を身につけた状態で、派手な水しぶきと共に香り高い酒の中に落ちた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un chorro de alcohol te golpea en la nariz. Tus manos resbalan del pretil y caes en la fuente del aromático licor con toda tu indumentaria y tu arsenal, produciendo un estruendoso chapoteo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A stream of alcohol hits your nose. Your hands slip off the parapet. In full dress and along with all your weapons, you fall into the fragrant liquor, making a terribly loud splash.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un chorro de alcohol te golpea en la nariz. Tus manos resbalan del pretil y caes en la fuente del aromático licor con toda tu indumentaria y tu arsenal, produciendo un estruendoso chapoteo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir alkol seli, burnuna çarpıyor. Ellerin korkuluktan kayıyor. Tüm giysilerin ve silahlarınla birlikte hoş kokulu içkinin içine düşüyor ve aşırı gürültülü bir şapırtı çıkarıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A stream of alcohol hits your nose. Your hands slip off the parapet. In full dress and along with all your weapons, you fall into the fragrant liquor, making a terribly loud splash.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir alkol seli, burnuna çarpıyor. Ellerin korkuluktan kayıyor. Tüm giysilerin ve silahlarınla birlikte hoş kokulu içkinin içine düşüyor ve aşırı gürültülü bir şapırtı çıkarıyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un jet d'alcool vous asperge le nez. Votre main glisse sur le parapet et vous tombez dans le liquide odorant en grande tenue avec toutes vos armes, dans un éclaboussement particulièrement bruyant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A stream of alcohol hits your nose. Your hands slip off the parapet. In full dress and along with all your weapons, you fall into the fragrant liquor, making a terribly loud splash.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un jet d'alcool vous asperge le nez. Votre main glisse sur le parapet et vous tombez dans le liquide odorant en grande tenue avec toutes vos armes, dans un éclaboussement particulièrement bruyant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Duft von Alkohol steigt dir in die Nase. Deine Hände gleiten von dem Geländer. Du fällst mit einem schrecklich lauten Platschen mit allen deinen Gewändern und Waffen in den duftenden Alkohol.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A stream of alcohol hits your nose. Your hands slip off the parapet. In full dress and along with all your weapons, you fall into the fragrant liquor, making a terribly loud splash.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Duft von Alkohol steigt dir in die Nase. Deine Hände gleiten von dem Geländer. Du fällst mit einem schrecklich lauten Platschen mit allen deinen Gewändern und Waffen in den duftenden Alkohol.
